title: Ep 161 | Jase's New Treasure-Hunting Finds, the Netflix Indictment, and Jesus the Human Detector
description:
Jase is giddy over the 127-year-old coin he found after a hurricane uprooted a magnolia tree on his property, but Missy isn't thrilled about Jase's next metal-detecting idea. Phil, Jase, and Al talk about uncovering lost treasure in God's creation, why Jesus spent time with sinners, the Netflix indictment, and seeking the light of the world. And Jase reveals how he ended up growing a tree in the back of his truck.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
